Name: Ehandcipation
About the game: Prepare for a highly competitive experience. Ehandcipation was born from the concepts of shoot 'em ups. Dodge bullets, gain the upper hand with power ups and destroy everything that moves, sounds familiar? Of course! But this time, the enemies are your friends. Gather around the couch, choose to play solo or in teams, fight off on this Bullet hell X Brawler crossover. And remember, if you ever need a helping hand, youâ€™ll find one at the end of your joystick. XBox-like mapped controller use is mandatory for multiplayer.
